# removeAll()

**Instance Method**

Removes all mesh parts from this collection.

## Declaration

```swift
mutating func removeAll()
```

## Updating collection contents

- **append(_:)**: Adds an element to the end of the collection.
- **append(contentsOf:)**: Adds the elements of a sequence or collection to the end of this collection.
- **replaceAll(_:)**: Replaces all mesh parts in this collection with those from the new sequence.
